delete.semregistro: you need to register on our website <http://discloudbot.com>.
delete.sembots: you haven't uploaded any bot yet, use `.up` to upload.
delete.semid: type the ID of the bot you want to delete a file or folder.
delete.idinvalido: the given ID is not the same as any of your bots.
delete.semcaminho: type the path of the file or folder you want to delete from the bot directory.
delete.principal: you cannot delete your bot's main file.
delete.invalidFolder: you cannot delete the {{folder}} folder from your bot directory.
delete.invalidFile: you cannot delete the {{file}} file from your bot directory.
delete.invalidDirectory:
invalid path.
If you want to delete a folder, put `/` at the end of the path and if it is a file, put the extension.
delete.verifyFolder: do you really want to delete the folder `{{folder}}` and its {{num}} files/folders inside?
delete.verifyFile: do you really want to delete the {{file}} file permanently from your bot directory?
delete.timeOut: you took too long to respond and the action was canceled.
delete.unknowError: an error occurred while deleting the file/folder, contact support.

mods.cmd: only donors can use this command.
mods.modadd: only donors can add moderators to their bots.
mods.nbh: you don't have any hosted bot.
mods.limitmax: this bot has already reached the maximum possible moderators.
mods.idmodadd: enter the ID of the moderator you want to add to the bot.
mods.memnosv: this member is not part of the server.
mods.nomod: you cannot add a bot as a moderator.
mods.usernomod: you cannot add yourself as a moderator.
mods.modbot: this user is already a moderator of this bot.
mods.addmodbot: the member {{user}} Bot moderator has been added.
mods.rbmod: only donors can remove moderators from their bots.
mods.idmodrb: enter the ID of the moderator you want to remove from the bot.
mods.mmb: this member is not a moderator for this bot.
mods.modrb: The moderator has been successfully removed.
mods.addpermbot: only donors can add permissions to bot moderators.
mods.altpermmod: enter the ID of the moderator who wants to change the permissions.
mods.cmdaddperm: enter the name of the command you want to add / remove from the moderator's permissions.
mods.viewlogmod: only donors can see the moderation logs for their bots.
mods.logmodline: Last 20 lines of the bot moderation logs:
mods.listmod: sonly donors can list their bot moderators.
mods.modnobot: you are not a moderator of this bot.
mods.noperm: you are not allowed to run this command on the bot.
mods.rpmod: ** has been removed ** permission to use the command {{comando}} moderator <@{{modID}}>.
mods.adpmod: ** permission was added to use the command {{comando}} moderator <@${{modID}}>.
mods.opcinval: invalid option, try: ** add, start, list, logs, stop, perm, restart, remove, terminal **.
